metadata.synopsis: Evil ending where the player determined to take the power of the netherbrain for themselves and betray Orpheus/Emperor/Illithid Karlach. In this case, the player is not dark urge (can be Dark Urge for Patch 6), and not an illithid themselves (handled elsewhere)
metadata.how_to_trigger: loadlevel END_Mainoe mindbattleoe mindbraindieschoose to control the brain(or use debugbookwith Endgame Master Setup)

32.text: *Absolute authority. A bliss like no other, drawn from a brain most great - and most vile.*
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is seated on their throne atop the Netherbrain after having seized control. Their companions, if present, stand nearby, enthralled/dominated.

88.speaker: Narrator
88.text: *The world is yours. All who still draw breath bow to you. Your authority is unmatched. Your power is... Absolute.*
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player stands and gazes down at the city. Psionic energy pulsates from them, like a signal. The Netherbrain starts to descend.

37.text: See how they kneel to us? We are their protectors, their salvation,  and we will rule them, together.
37.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Down on street level. Various Baldurians cower or stand ready to defend themselves from Mind Flayers. They grimace, awaiting the final assault... 

... but it does not come. The Mind Flayers no longer attack, but keep the survivors surrounded, watching and waiting.

The Baldurians look up in terror and awe as a huge shadow falls.

20.text: See how they kneel to us? We are their protectors, their salvation,  and we will rule them, together.
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: The source of the shadow - the Netherbrain - descends towards the streets, blotting out the sun. Baldurians cringe in fear.

100.speaker: Astarion
100.text: See how they kneel to us? We are their protectors, their salvation,  and we will rule them, together.
100.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The Netherbrain's descent slows as it nears street level. Damaged buildings tremble, and a great cloud of dust fills the air. The watching Mind Flayers part ranks. From the dust cloud -

- The Enthralled Companions stride forth. They clear a path to the Baldurians like an honour guard. A final figure floats downwards as the dust settles. The Player. Psionics pulse outwards from the player. All those around them, including Enthralled Companions, kneel. All save for Love Interest Minthara, if present. She approaches the player's side.

13.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
13.text: See how they kneel to us? We are their protectors, their salvation,  and we will rule them, together.

72.speaker: Player
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player steps away from their love interest walks amongst the masses.They look around, considering what to do next...

59.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
59.text: The taste of conquest lingers on your lips. Fear not, my love - soon we will savour it again.
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player steps away from their love interest walks amongst the masses.They look around, considering what to do next...

47.text: *You have come so far. Once, you feared ceremorphosis, but no more. It has granted you ultimate power, and now ushers your dreams towards reality...*
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player steps away from their love interest walks amongst the masses.They look around, considering what to do next...

80.speaker: Narrator
80.text: *You have come so far. Once, you feared ceremorphosis, but no more. It has granted you ultimate power, and now ushers your dreams towards reality...*
80.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is suddenly gripped by pain, hunching over. They gasp and clutch at their breast.

27.speaker: Narrator
27.text: *But such power has a price, and yours are not the only dreams. You feel compelled to follow the will of the illithid hivemind. To enact the Grand Design.*

101.speaker: Narrator
101.text: *Your willpower prevails. You remain in control. If the Grand Design is to unfold, it shall only do so at your command. But it is not the only choice that tempts you...*

25.speaker: Narrator
25.text: *Your willpower prevails. You remain in control. If the Grand Design is to unfold, it shall only do so at your command. But it is not the only choice that tempts you...*

24.text: *It's no use - you feel control slipping away. The Grand Design shall not be denied.*

29.speaker: Narrator
29.text: *It's no use - you feel control slipping away. The Grand Design shall not be denied.*

31.speaker: Player
31.text: Your choices brought you to this moment. Accept your part in the Grand Design.

36.speaker: Narrator
36.text: *You cede control. It's almost comforting, to be part of something far grander than any individual. You are the crest of a great wave that will consume all, and redefine all.*

33.speaker: Narrator
33.text: *... or so it would have been, had you not indulged too often in the power that the illithids provided. Now the scales demand to be balanced. Ceremorphosis beckons...*
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is suddenly gripped by pain, hunching over. They gasp and clutch at their breast.

38.speaker: Player
38.text: Resist. You are in control, not the parasites.
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player grimaces in concentration and wills the ceremorphosis away (may need some vfx to sell this, otherwise it may look like indigestion). They straighten back up, calm and in control.

86.text: *Luckily, the illithid powers were but one aspect of your might. You remain in control, now and always. Time to exercise your will.*
86.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player grimaces in concentration and wills the ceremorphosis away (may need some vfx to sell this, otherwise it may look like indigestion). They straighten back up, calm and in control.

53.text: *Luckily, the illithid powers were but one aspect of your might. You remain in control, now and always. Time to exercise your will.*
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player grimaces in concentration and wills the ceremorphosis away (may need some vfx to sell this, otherwise it may look like indigestion). They straighten back up, calm and in control.

17.speaker: Narrator
17.text: *Luckily, the illithid powers were but one aspect of your might. You remain in control, now and always. Time to exercise your will.*

70.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player succumbs to ceremorphosis (dealer's choice as to how this is handled/how much is shown - perhaps it can largely play off-screen with sound FX while onlookers watch). The player straightens, looking at their transformed hand. Illithid armour magically materialises upon them.

105.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player succumbs to ceremorphosis (dealer's choice as to how this is handled/how much is shown - perhaps it can largely play off-screen with sound FX while onlookers watch). The player straightens, looking at their transformed hand. Illithid armour magically materialises upon them.

57.speaker: Player
57.text: Your choices brought you here. Accept your fate and succumb to ceremorphosis.

91.speaker: The Emperor
91.text: *Bhaal shall not be sated until you are the last creature living. The Gate is the eye of your extinction, then Amn, then Waterdeep, all the way to the damned Spine of the World.*
91.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player reaches towards their eye socket. Onlookers gasp, reacting to a tadpole extraction (show as much or as little of the extraction as you see fit). The player considers the tadpole in their palm with a thoughtful 'so this is what caused  all the fuss' expression. Expression then hardens and the tadpole combusts in their palm. They drop embers to the ground, satisfied.

85.speaker: Narrator
85.text: *You have come so far. Once you wished for nothing more than to survive, but now your dreams are far grander. By your hand alone, the future of all things shall be determined.*
85.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player reaches towards their eye socket. Onlookers gasp, reacting to a tadpole extraction (show as much or as little of the extraction as you see fit). The player considers the tadpole in their palm with a thoughtful 'so this is what caused  all the fuss' expression. Expression then hardens and the tadpole combusts in their palm. They drop embers to the ground, satisfied.

65.speaker: Player
65.text: You destroyed one god. It's time the rest of the heavens shared in the Absolute's fate.
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player reaches towards their eye socket. Onlookers gasp, reacting to a tadpole extraction (show as much or as little of the extraction as you see fit). The player considers the tadpole in their palm with a thoughtful 'so this is what caused  all the fuss' expression. Expression then hardens and the tadpole combusts in their palm. They drop embers to the ground, satisfied.

50.speaker: Player
50.text: Infuse yourself with the power of the Absolute - become the ruler you were destined to be.
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player reaches towards their eye socket. Onlookers gasp, reacting to a tadpole extraction (show as much or as little of the extraction as you see fit). The player considers the tadpole in their palm with a thoughtful 'so this is what caused  all the fuss' expression. Expression then hardens and the tadpole combusts in their palm. They drop embers to the ground, satisfied.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: I shall rule like no other has before me, as the great unifier, wise leader, and final judge.
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player reaches towards their eye socket. Onlookers gasp, reacting to a tadpole extraction (show as much or as little of the extraction as you see fit). The player considers the tadpole in their palm with a thoughtful 'so this is what caused  all the fuss' expression. Expression then hardens and the tadpole combusts in their palm. They drop embers to the ground, satisfied.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: With this power, I shall conquer Tu'narath. Queen Vlaakith's reign enters its final days.
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player reaches towards their eye socket. Onlookers gasp, reacting to a tadpole extraction (show as much or as little of the extraction as you see fit). The player considers the tadpole in their palm with a thoughtful 'so this is what caused  all the fuss' expression. Expression then hardens and the tadpole combusts in their palm. They drop embers to the ground, satisfied.

77.speaker: Player
77.text: All my life, I've been caught between two warring goddesses. Time to plot a new course.
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player reaches towards their eye socket. Onlookers gasp, reacting to a tadpole extraction (show as much or as little of the extraction as you see fit). The player considers the tadpole in their palm with a thoughtful 'so this is what caused  all the fuss' expression. Expression then hardens and the tadpole combusts in their palm. They drop embers to the ground, satisfied.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: Fuck Baldur's Gate. Fuck Avernus. They're mine now.
73.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player reaches towards their eye socket. Onlookers gasp, reacting to a tadpole extraction (show as much or as little of the extraction as you see fit). The player considers the tadpole in their palm with a thoughtful 'so this is what caused  all the fuss' expression. Expression then hardens and the tadpole combusts in their palm. They drop embers to the ground, satisfied.

8.text: This is just the beginning. More worlds shall fall to you.

The player considers the tadpole in their palm with a thoughtful 'so this is what caused  all the fuss' expression. Expression then hardens and the tadpole combusts in their palm. 0.speaker: Player
0.text: The city shall become a monument to your glory. Rebuilt by your adoring subjects.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player reaches towards their eye socket. Onlookers gasp, reacting to a tadpole extraction (show as much or as little of the extraction as you see fit). The player considers the tadpole in their palm with a thoughtful 'so this is what caused  all the fuss' expression. Expression then hardens and the tadpole combusts in their palm. 60.speaker: Player
60.text: There can be no future for such sheep. Will them all to die.
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player reaches towards their eye socket. Onlookers gasp, reacting to a tadpole extraction (show as much or as little of the extraction as you see fit). The player considers the tadpole in their palm with a thoughtful 'so this is what caused  all the fuss' expression. Expression then hardens and the tadpole combusts in their palm. 55.text: Remove the tadpole at last and depart with your companions.

30.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player turns to leave. Companions nod their assent and exit frame (implication that they're joining you/leaving first)

51.speaker: Player
51.text: Rid yourself of the parasite at last and walk away from all of this - alone.
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player turns to leave.  Companions react, crestallen

44.speaker: Player
44.text: Rid yourself of the parasite at last and walk away from all of this.
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player turns to leave.  Companions react, crestallen

83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player turns to leave.  Companions react, crestallen

6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player turns to leave. alone

64.speaker: Player
64.text: Force Minthara to kneel along with the rest. All bow to you now.
64.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's psionics pummel Minthara. She  just about manages to force a look of shock and betrayal onto their face before they are forced onto their knees in supplication.

43.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's psionics pummel Minthara. She  just about manages to force a look of shock and betrayal onto their face before they are forced onto their knees in supplication.

16.speaker: Lae'zel
16.text: Well, my love, we did it. This world is ours, as it should be.
16.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The Netherbrain's descent slows as it nears street level. Damaged buildings tremble, and a great cloud of dust fills the air. The watching Mind Flayers part ranks. From the dust cloud -

- The Enthralled Companions stride forth. They clear a path to the Baldurians like an honour guard. A final figure floats downwards as the dust settles. The Player. Psionics pulse outwards from the player. All those around them, including Enthralled Companions, kneel. All save for Love Interest Astarion, if present. He approaches the player's side.

63.speaker: Astarion
63.text: Well, my love, we did it. This world is ours, as it should be.

92.speaker: Player
92.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's psionics pummel Astarion. He just about manages to force a look of shock and betrayal onto his face before he's forced onto his knees in supplication.

42.speaker: Astarion
42.text: I always knew you could do it. I always knew that together, we could do anything.

90.speaker: Astarion
90.text: I always knew you could do it. I always knew that together, we could do anything.

12.text: I always knew you could do it. I always knew that together, we could do anything.

4.speaker: Astarion
4.text: I always knew you could do it. I always knew that together, we could do anything.

26.speaker: Player
26.text: 'Ours'? Force Astarion to kneel along with the rest. All bow to you now.
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's psionics pummel Astarion. He just about manages to force a look of shock and betrayal onto his face before he's forced onto his knees in supplication.

94.speaker: Astarion
94.text: No, what are you doing? I won't - you can't... No... Please...
94.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player's psionics pummel Astarion. He just about manages to force a look of shock and betrayal onto his face before he's forced onto his knees in supplication.

23.speaker: Narrator
23.text: The power to raise or ruin empires lies with you now. But how shall you wield it?
23.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The Netherbrain's descent slows as it nears street level. Damaged buildings tremble, and a great cloud of dust fills the air. The watching Mind Flayers part ranks. From the dust cloud -

- The Enthralled Companions stride forth. They clear a path to the Baldurians like an honour guard. A final figure floats downwards as the dust settles. The Player. Psionics pulse outwards from the player. All those around them, including Enthralled Companions, kneel

11.speaker: Player
11.text: The power to raise or ruin empires lies with you now. But how shall you wield it?
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player walks amongst the masses (all kneeling/no love interest standing) They look around, considering what to do next...

34.speaker: Lae'zel
34.text: The power to raise or ruin empires lies with you now. But how shall you wield it?
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player walks amongst the masses (all kneeling/no love interest standing) They look around, considering what to do next...

18.speaker: Karlach
18.text: It's yours, soldier. Ultimate power. What will you do?
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player walks amongst the masses (all kneeling/no love interest standing) They look around, considering what to do next...

1.speaker: Jaheira
1.text: At last. The power to tame or break the world is yours. Where will you begin?
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player walks amongst the masses (all kneeling/no love interest standing) They look around, considering what to do next...

3.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player walks amongst the masses (all kneeling/no love interest standing) They look around, considering what to do next...

10.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
10.text: The world awaits your command. What is it to be?

46.speaker: Wyll
46.text: Your power reaches to the horizon and beyond now. How do you intend to wield it?

69.speaker: Shadowheart
69.text: So much power... no one can resist you now. But what comes next?

74.speaker: Gale
74.text: Power beyond mortal reckoning, held in the palm of your hand. And what mighty works will you turn that hand to?

84.speaker: Astarion
84.text: Now you have it all - unlimited power. So what will you do with it?

103.speaker: Minsc
103.text: SHUT UP, BOO! Tell on, my friend - what will you do next?

104.speaker: Halsin
104.text: You have prevailed. Power beyond measure now rests in your hand... but how to wield it?

41.text: *But what shall you do with such power? Rule this world? Conquer others? Snuff out all life? Or something else entirely? Your darkest dreams are now possible.*

54.speaker: Narrator
54.text: *But what shall you do with such power? Rule this world? Conquer others? Snuff out all life? Or something else entirely? Your darkest dreams are now possible.*
